name: Dog Survive
description:
The city is a fast-paced place to live. Life is tough on the streets as a stray. Every day is another fight for survival. 

In Dog Survive, you play as a stray dog, hungry and looking for food. You can use your sense of smell to help locate food. Hurry though, you don't want to die of starvation! Keep your hungry at bay for long enough to survive another day in the city. Use your sense of smell (by holding down Q) to see if the food is good or bad.

Overall Game Design/Mechanics: Jelena Matic

2D Assets: Jelena Matic, Marcus Sett, Joshuah Shillingford, Dylan Ateba, Teng Zhang

Level Design: Teng Zhang

Game Development: Marcus Sett, Julian Peralta

Animation: Marcus Sett, Julian Peralta

UI Design: Marcus Sett, Jelena Matic
